name: Conjurer Coots and the Tower of Terror
name_original: Conjurer Coots and the Tower of Terror
description:
I WAS AN IDIOT AND DIDN'T UPLOAD ALL OF THE FILES, JUST THE EXE. ROOKIE MISTAKE BUT HERE IS A GOOGLE DRIVE LINK FOR THE REMAINING FILES:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dKw454EMDkrd82qFGgoC61UsmWhRrJZn/view?usp=share...

Coots has to use her conjuring abilities to drop magical spheres on the liberal commie cats waiting below. The goal is to keep your tower as high as possible while the woke mob tries to drag you down. Coots has a basic charged attack which drops a sphere on those below. Coots can also charge orbs for a variety of attacks which include a bomb for extra damage, rapid fire, freezing the towers descent for a time, wiping out one side of the tower and an ultimate ability which destroys any enemies touching the tower. Coots also has the ability to raise the tower back up using the central orb, but beware, at later levels this becomes impossible with too many enemies touching it at once. Cat audio provided by El Ludwigo himself.

Good luck.

GitHub: https://github.com/oscarnt4/Conjurer-Coots-and-the-Tower-of-Terror

Note: I didn't have time to fully flesh out the visuals so they are pretty basic and the cats are free unity assets, tinted to be the colours I want.
